creator: chandrasekharan@intelligroup.com
text:
Hi,

 This problem i have to fix quickly.i have 2 days only Please help me. i am
reading an excel file and writing into another excel file. when i am opening the
second excel file it is giving "File error:data may have been lost". after that
it is opening 2 sheets in one page ie it is duplicating the existing one.

Thanks,
Chandrasekhara.N

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
This will sound rude but I don't mean it to be...

chat it out on the list.  At the very most I'd put needs info on this cause you
like failed to supply any kind of information to make it a useful bug report. 
On the list someone may have enough patience to ask you enough questions, but I
have no patience for "something happened" bug reports (99.9% of which turn out
to be bugs in the reporter's code).
